metadata.name: Create OTF Variable
metadata.shortDescription: Guide developers through adding OTF variables with proper XML configuration and C++ accessor code
metadata.description: Assists developers in creating OTF (Open Transaction Framework) variables by generating proper XML configuration, environment-specific overrides, and C++ accessor code following Amadeus best practices for feature flags and runtime configuration management.
objectives: Gather requirements for new OTF variables (name, purpose, values, environments)
Generate proper XML configuration with common and phase-specific sections
Provide C++ accessor code using PropertiesManager patterns
Ensure naming conventions and best practices are followed
Guide gradual rollout strategy from LOCAL to production environments
metadata.author: OLAF Team
